dosing.notes: Slow titration mandatory to prevent SJS.

canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Same as outpatient. Cannot rush due to SJS risk.
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Strict adherence to 25mg increments. Educate on rash.
canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: 200 mg is standard target. Some patients need 300-400mg.

cautions.hepatic: Reduce dose by 50% in moderate, 75% in severe impairment.
cautions.pregnancy: Generally considered safer than Valproate/Lithium, but cleft lip risk debate.
